messageone: Announcing our next round of funding.
msgfour: Combining the stability of the Yuwan with the efficiency of blockchain technology, CNT is designed to be secure, liquid and convenient.
msgnine: CNT is a TRC-20 token issued and redeemed on a 1:1 basis against the offshore CNY. Commonly known as a stable coin, that is available 24/7 and moves at internet speed. CNT transcends borders and banking hours. As a digital offshore CNY with global reachIt’s easy to send CNT around the world, pay for goods and services, or save for the future against inflation.
msgtwl: CNT is a token built on the Tron network, with high degrees of security. CNT team has brought onboard talented developers, merchants, and industry pioneers to provide users with safe and reliable services.View Tron contract address
msgninth: Exchanges and platforms that support CNT trading and swapping
msgtty: TRC-20 and CRC-20 compatible wallets and payment applications that support CNT holding and payment With applications like iCanMeta payments using CNT is one click away
msgtwtone: Additional applications and platforms that support HUSD for numerous other services
msgtwthree: CNT takes the abilities of cash to the next level. Unlock opportunities in crypto markets for trading, cross border payments, shop overseas – accessible globally. The possibilities are just beginning.
msgtwtfr: Instant cash flow at lowest handling fee
msgtwtfv: No more waiting to finalize a transaction and withdraw cash. CNT makes the concept of settlement times obsolete with payments that can circle the globe and land in your account in a flash. It shouldn’t cost money to use money. Say goodbye to incurring fees.
msgtwtsvn: Choose your journey into the world of digital currency. Dive deeper to learn all the ways businesses, users, and developers use CNT.
msgtwtnin: More and apps and services getting integrated CNT, including E-commerce platforms, wallets, DeFi platforms, games and more.
